```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggecho)
library(hrbrthemes)
hrbrthemes::import_roboto_condensed()
```




```{r}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2021, week = 33)

investment <- tuesdata$investment
chain <- tuesdata$chain_investment
ipd <- tuesdata$ipd
```



```{r}
investment %>% 
  group_by(meta_cat, year) %>% 
  summarise(gross_inv = sum(gross_inv)) %>% 
  filter(year == min(year) | year == max(year)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = gross_inv, color = meta_cat)) +
  geom_point(stat = "echo") 
```

```{r}
library(showtext)

font_add_google("Roboto", "roboto")
```

```{r message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
options(scipen = 999)
investment %>% 
  filter(meta_cat == "Water supply") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = gross_inv, color = category)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(~ meta_cat, scales = "free") +
  theme_ft_rc()
```
